JobFullDesc: Do you want to be part of the team building the Cloud platform for Microsoft? Are you passionate about cloud computing, large scale distributed systems engineering problems and working on bleeding edge technology at massive scale? Are you motivated by customer engagements and delighting them? Are you looking to grow your career in a product having an explosive growth? The Microsoft Azure Core team builds and manages the software infrastructure underpinning the Azure IaaS and PaaS Compute offerings (Azure Cloud Services and Azure Virtual Machines). These capabilities form both our public Azure compute platform, as well as the foundation of service offerings across Microsoft. Be part of a strategic team, with Microsoft-wide impact, to help build a world class platform to take on competition. We are looking for a program manager to manage large cross-team initiatives encompassing the Azure application lifecycle, app availability and reliability, and platform scale and reliability. The role will be central to key Cloud & Enterprise division initiatives on customer experience / availability and platform competitiveness, and you’ll be part of the team building a services platform with scale and availability targets that don’t exist in the industry today. In this role, you will engage with customers, help identify platform gaps and be part of a team that will take the platform and customer experience to the next level. To succeed in this role, you should have strong technical and analytical skills, excellent cross-group collaboration skills, and a passion for customers. You should also have a strong track record of delivery in a services environment.
